ApiKey.description: The API Key of the Elastic Cloud to connect to.

CloudId.description: The CloudId of the Elastic Cloud to connect to.

DisableHealthChecks.description: Gets or sets a boolean value that indicates whether the Elasticsearch health check is disabled or not.

DisableTracing.description: Gets or sets a boolean value that indicates whether the OpenTelemetry tracing is disabled or not.

Endpoint.description: The endpoint URI string of the Elasticsearch to connect to.

HealthCheckTimeout.description: Gets or sets a integer value that indicates the Elasticsearch health check timeout in milliseconds.

Elasticsearch.description: Provides the client configuration settings for connecting to a Elasticsearch using Elastic.Clients.Elasticsearch.
